name: N Y M P H I O N
description:
[SIMULATANEON SERIES #007]

N Y M P H I O N

Those who were promised land will forever remain aimless pariahs. For them, Deliverance is a deep rooted thirst which has nothing to do with Justice, and cannot be quenched. Nyphion is the dream of those who ignore that they never left Eden.

SIMULATANEON is a 2017 hypersigil and a conceptual prison break map for the upcoming matrix system update. The sigils that were borrowed for this series reveal only part of a bigger tapestry.
